text: Describe all the ways you can determine if a situation is a proportional relationship.

Possible answer:

We have seen proportional situations in Royal’s Pizza, in sharing pizzas at the tables, in the orange juice recipes, and with similar figures in Stretching and Shrinking.

A proportional situation is multiplicative. It involves using factors or multiples of the quantities in a ratio.

With proportional situations, we can:

  • Scale ratios by multiplying or dividing both quantities to find equivalent ratios.
  • Show the equivalent ratios in many ways including tables and proportions.
  • Use the unit rate to write equations, like Mary did for Royal’s, CR = 13n.
  • Make graphs that go through the origin.
